import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import HistoryAPI from '../../API/HistoryAPI'; import queryString from 'query-string'; MainHistory.propTypes = {}; function MainHistory(props) { const [listCart, setListCart] = useState([]); const formatCurrency = (value) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' }).format(value); }; useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const params = { id: localStorage.getItem('id_user'), }; console.log(params.id); const response = await HistoryAPI.getHistoryAPI(params); console.log(response); setListCart(response); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
